channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Daylight saving time ends Sunday. Here's what to know
item.description: Love it or hate it, many will turn their clocks back on Sunday. The debate — whether or not to make daylight saving time permanent — continues.

item.title: Trump threatens military action in Nigeria over Christian persecution claims
item.description: President Trump on Saturday said he's ordered the Pentagon to plan for potential military action in Nigeria, where he alleges the government is failin...

item.title: 10 people hospitalized after UK train stabbing attack, 9 with life-threatening injuries
item.description: British police said 10 people have been hospitalized, nine with life-threatening injuries, following a mass stabbing attack on a London-bound train Sa...

item.title: 2 more suspects are charged in the Louvre jewel heist
item.description: A man and a woman, both in their late 30s, were charged with organized crime and being an accomplice, respectively. In total, four people have been ch...

item.title: US carries out new strike in Caribbean, killing 3 alleged drug smugglers
item.description: The U.S. military has carried out another lethal strike on alleged drug smugglers in the Caribbean Sea.

item.title: AI researchers ’embodied’ an LLM into a robot – and it started channeling Robin Williams
item.description: AI researchers at Andon Labs embedded various LLMs in a vacuum robot to test how ready they were to be embodied. And hilarity ensued.

item.title: Elon Musk wants you to know that Sam Altman got a refund for his Tesla Roadster
item.description: Elon Musk and Sam Altman are still taking swipes at each other on Musk’s social media platform X.

item.title: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong trolls the prediction markets
item.description: While Armstrong may have helped some Kalshi and Polymarket users make a little money, he was also illustrating how easily these markets can be manipul...

item.title: Rising energy prices put AI and data centers in the crosshairs
item.description: A majority of consumers say they’re worried about data centers driving up electricity costs. Is the industry prepared for a possible backlash?

item.title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about AOL’s acquirer
item.description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.

item.title: Uncertainty over federal food aid grows as the shutdown fight reaches a crisis point
item.description: The twin crises at the heart of the government shutdown fight in Washington are coming to a head. The federal food assistance program is facing delays...

item.title: SNAP benefits cut off during shutdown, driving long lines at food pantries
Ohio panel and Virginia lawmakers move forward with congressional redistricting plans
